verses.verse: Now this is the history of the generations <S%H8435><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> with Moses <S%H4872><s%> in Mount <S%H2022><s%> Sinai. <S%H5514><s%>

These are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron: <S%H175><s%> Nadab <S%H5070><s%> the firstborn, <S%H1060><s%> and Abihu, <S%H30><s%> Eleazar, <S%H499><s%> and Ithamar. <S%H385><s%>

These are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> who were anointed, <S%H4886><s%> whom he consecrated <S%H4390><s%> to minister in the priest <S%H3547><s%>'s office.

Nadab <S%H5070><s%> and Abihu <S%H30><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> when they offered <S%H7126><s%> strange <S%H2114><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> and they had no children. <S%H1121><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> and Ithamar <S%H385><s%> ministered in the priest <S%H3547><s%>'s office in the presence <S%H6440><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> their father. <S%H1><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Bring <S%H7126><s%> the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> near, <S%H7126><s%> and set <S%H5975><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> that they may minister to him. <S%H8334><s%>

They shall keep <S%H8104><s%> his requirements, <S%H4931><s%> and the requirements <S%H4931><s%> of the whole congregation <S%H5712><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H5712><s%> to do <S%H5647><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>

They shall keep <S%H8104><s%> all the furnishings <S%H3627><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> and the obligations <S%H4931><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> to do <S%H5647><s%> the service <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>

You shall give <S%H5414><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> to Aaron <S%H175><s%> and to his sons. <S%H1121><s%> They are wholly given <S%H5414><s%> to him on the behalf of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

You shall appoint <S%H6485><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons, <S%H1121><s%> and they shall keep <S%H8104><s%> their priesthood. <S%H3550><s%> The stranger <S%H2114><s%> who comes near <S%H7131><s%> shall be put to death. <S%H4191><s%>"
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Behold, <S%H3947><s%> I have taken the Levites <S%H3881><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> instead of all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> who open <S%H6363><s%> the womb <S%H7358><s%> among the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and the Levites shall be mine: <S%H3881><s%>

for all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> are mine. <S%H3117><s%> On the day that I struck <S%H5221><s%> down all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> I made holy <S%H6942><s%> to me all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> in Israel, <S%H3478><s%> both man <S%H120><s%> and animal. <S%H929><s%> They shall be mine. <S%H3068><s%> I am Yahweh."
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai, <S%H5514><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Count <S%H6485><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> by their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses, <S%H1004><s%> by their families. <S%H4940><s%> You shall count <S%H6485><s%> every male <S%H2145><s%> from a month <S%H2320><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward. <S%H4605><s%>"
Moses <S%H4872><s%> numbered <S%H6485><s%> them according to the word <S%H6310><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> as he was commanded. <S%H6680><s%>
These were the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> by their names: <S%H8034><s%> Gershon, <S%H1648><s%> and Kohath, <S%H6955><s%> and Merari. <S%H4847><s%>
These are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon <S%H1648><s%> by their families: <S%H4940><s%> Libni <S%H3845><s%> and Shimei. <S%H8096><s%>
The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> by their families: <S%H4940><s%> Amram, <S%H6019><s%> and Izhar, <S%H3324><s%> Hebron, <S%H2275><s%> and Uzziel. <S%H5816><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%> by their families: <S%H4940><s%> Mahli <S%H4249><s%> and Mushi. <S%H4187><s%> These are <S%H1992><s%> the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> according to their fathers <S%H1><s%>' houses. <S%H1004><s%>

Of Gershon <S%H1648><s%> was the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Libnites, <S%H3846><s%> and the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Shimeites: <S%H8097><s%> these are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Gershonites. <S%H1649><s%>

Those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, <S%H4557><s%> according to the number of all the males, <S%H2145><s%> from a month <S%H2320><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> even those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them were seven <S%H7651><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> hundred. <S%H3967><s%>
The families <S%H4940><s%> of the Gershonites <S%H1649><s%> shall encamp <S%H2583><s%> behind <S%H310><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> westward. <S%H3220><s%>
The prince <S%H5387><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%>' house <S%H1004><s%> of the Gershonites <S%H1649><s%> shall be Eliasaph <S%H460><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Lael. <S%H3815><s%>

The duty <S%H4931><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon <S%H1648><s%> in the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting <S%H4150><s%> shall be the tabernacle, <S%H168><s%> and the tent, <S%H4908><s%> its covering, <S%H168><s%> and the screen <S%H4372><s%> for the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%>

and the hangings <S%H7050><s%> of the court, <S%H2691><s%> and the screen <S%H4539><s%> for the door <S%H6607><s%> of the court, <S%H2691><s%> which is by the tabernacle, <S%H4908><s%> and around <S%H5439><s%> the altar, <S%H4196><s%> and its cords <S%H4340><s%> for all of its service. <S%H5656><s%>

Of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> was the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Amramites, <S%H6020><s%> and the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Izharites, <S%H3325><s%> and the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Hebronites, <S%H2276><s%> and the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Uzzielites: <S%H5817><s%> these are the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Kohathites. <S%H6956><s%>

According to the number <S%H4557><s%> of all the males, <S%H2145><s%> from a month <S%H2320><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> there were eight <S%H8083><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> six <S%H8337><s%> hundred, <S%H3967><s%> keeping <S%H8104><s%> the requirements <S%H4931><s%> of the sanctuary. <S%H6944><s%>
The families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> shall encamp <S%H2583><s%> on the south <S%H8486><s%> side <S%H3409><s%> of the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>

The prince <S%H5387><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%>' house <S%H1004><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Kohathites <S%H6956><s%> shall be Elizaphan <S%H469><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Uzziel. <S%H5816><s%>

Their duty <S%H4931><s%> shall be the ark, <S%H727><s%> the table, <S%H7979><s%> the lamp <S%H4501><s%> stand, <S%H4196><s%> the altars, the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%> with which they minister, <S%H8334><s%> and the screen, <S%H4539><s%> and all its service. <S%H5656><s%>

Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall be prince <S%H5387><s%> of the princes <S%H5387><s%> of the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> with the oversight <S%H6486><s%> of those who keep <S%H8104><s%> the requirements <S%H4931><s%> of the sanctuary. <S%H6944><s%>

Of Merari <S%H4847><s%> was the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Mahlites, <S%H4250><s%> and the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Mushites. <S%H4188><s%> These are the families <S%H4940><s%> of Merari. <S%H4847><s%>

Those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, <S%H4557><s%> according to the number of all the males, <S%H2145><s%> from a month <S%H2320><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> were six <S%H8337><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> two hundred. <S%H3967><s%>

The prince <S%H5387><s%> of the fathers <S%H1><s%>' house <S%H1004><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%> was Zuriel <S%H6700><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Abihail. <S%H32><s%> They shall encamp <S%H2583><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> side <S%H3409><s%> of the tabernacle. <S%H4908><s%>

The appointed <S%H6486><s%> duty <S%H4931><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%> shall be the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>'s boards, <S%H7175><s%> its bars, <S%H1280><s%> its pillars, <S%H5982><s%> its sockets, <S%H134><s%> all its instruments, <S%H3627><s%> all its service, <S%H5656><s%>
the pillars <S%H5982><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> it, <S%H134><s%> their sockets, their pins, <S%H3489><s%> and their cords. <S%H4340><s%>

Those who encamp <S%H2583><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> eastward, <S%H6924><s%> in front <S%H6440><s%> of the Tent <S%H4908><s%> of Meeting <S%H4150><s%> toward the sunrise, <S%H4217><s%> shall be Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons, <S%H1121><s%> keeping <S%H8104><s%> the requirements <S%H4931><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> for the duty <S%H4931><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%> The stranger <S%H2114><s%> who comes near <S%H7131><s%> shall be put to death. <S%H4191><s%>
All who were numbered of the Levites, whom Moses and Aaron numbered at the commandment of Yahweh, by their families, all the males from a month old and upward, were twenty - two thousand.

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Number <S%H6485><s%> all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> males <S%H2145><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from a month <S%H2320><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> and take <S%H5375><s%> the number <S%H4557><s%> of their names. <S%H8034><s%>

You shall take <S%H3947><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> for me <S%H3068><s%> (I am Yahweh) instead of all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> among the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and the livestock <S%H929><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> instead of all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> among the livestock <S%H929><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>"
Moses <S%H4872><s%> numbered, <S%H6485><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> him, <S%H1060><s%> all the firstborn among the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

All the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> males <S%H2145><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of names, <S%H8034><s%> from a month <S%H2320><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> of those who were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, <S%H6242><s%> were twenty - two <S%H8147><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> seventy <S%H7657><s%> - three.
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Take <S%H3947><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> instead of all the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> among the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and the livestock <S%H929><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%> instead of their livestock; <S%H929><s%> and the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall be mine. <S%H3068><s%> I am Yahweh.

For the redemption <S%H6302><s%> of the two hundred <S%H3967><s%> seventy <S%H3967><s%> - three of the <S%H1060><s%> firstborn of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> who exceed <S%H5736><s%> the number <S%H5921><s%> of the Levites, <S%H3881><s%>

you shall take <S%H3947><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> shekels <S%H8255><s%> apiece for each one; <S%H1538><s%> after the shekel <S%H8255><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%> you shall take <S%H3947><s%> them <S%H8255><s%> (the shekel is twenty <S%H6242><s%> gerahs <S%H1626><s%>):
and you shall give <S%H5414><s%> the money, <S%H3701><s%> with which their remainder <S%H5736><s%> is redeemed, <S%H6302><s%> to Aaron <S%H175><s%> and to his sons. <S%H1121><s%>"

Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the redemption <S%H6306><s%> money <S%H3701><s%> from those who exceeded <S%H5736><s%> the number of those who were redeemed <S%H6302><s%> by the Levites; <S%H3881><s%>

from the firstborn <S%H1060><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> he took <S%H3947><s%> the money, <S%H3701><s%> one thousand <S%H505><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> sixty <S%H8346><s%> - five <S%H2568><s%> shekels, <S%H8255><s%> after the shekel of the sanctuary: <S%H6944><s%>

and Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> the redemption <S%H6302><s%> money <S%H3701><s%> to Aaron <S%H175><s%> and to his sons, <S%H1121><s%> according to the word <S%H6310><s%> of Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
